member.name: T:ATT.Services.MessageDeliveryStatus
member.summary: Enumeration with all supported message delivery statuses - currently Initial, DeliveredToNetwork, DeliveredToTerminal, DeliveryImpossible, and Error.

member.name: F:ATT.Services.MessageDeliveryStatus.DeliveredToNetwork
member.summary: Delivered to the network but not yet delivered to the Handset.

member.name: F:ATT.Services.MessageDeliveryStatus.DeliveredToTerminal
member.summary: Successfully delivered to the Handset of the destination mobile number.

member.name: F:ATT.Services.MessageDeliveryStatus.DeliveryImpossible
member.summary: Unsuccessful delivery; the message could not be delivered before it expired.
